T02D3542:181a-1: shu kl'a pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a s'a dha ni /
T02D3542:181a-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3542:181a-4: 'phags ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3542:181a-5: gang zhig bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D3542:181a-6: shes rab pha rol phyin 'byung zhing //
T02D3542:181a-7: kun gyi byang chub rnam 'dzin pa //
T02D3542:181a-8: de nas yang dag bshad par bya //
T02D3542:181a-9: zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste //
T02D3542:181a-10: sku mdog dkar mo yid 'ong ma //
T02D3542:181a-11: dbu skra phyed phyed 'khyil pa can //
T02D3542:181a-12: chu skyes dkar la yang dag gnas //
T02D3542:181a-13: phyag g-yas na ni padma dang //
T02D3542:181a-14: g-yon na shes rab pha rol phyin //
T02D3542:181a-15: mdog dkar rnam par bsgom par bya //
T02D3542:181a-16: rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'i //
T02D3542:181a-17: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs //
T02D3542:181a-18: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor la bsgom bya //
T02D3542:181a-19: aom yig ye shes las byung ba //
T02D3542:181a-20: mchog tu dga' bar byed pa mo //
T02D3542:181a-21: dam tshig sems dpa' rdzogs byas la //
T02D3542:181a-22: ye shes sems dpa' bsgom par bya //
T02D3542:181a-23: rnal 'byor zla drug goms pa yis //
T02D3542:181a-24: shes rab pha rol phyin mar 'gyur //
T02D3542:181a-25: mtshan mo bdun gyi rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D3542:181a-26: bstan bcos kun la 'jigs pa med //
T02D3542:181a-27: bzlas pa 'bum du sbyor ba yis //
T02D3542:181a-28: nyin re nyin re tshigs bcad brgya //
T02D3542:181a-29: 'bad pa med par rab tu rtsom //
T02D3542:181a-30: gzhung yang rga ni 'dzin par byed //
T02D3542:181a-32: aom pi tsu pi tsu pradzny'a wardha ni dzva la
T02D3542:181a-33: dzva la me dha wardha ni dhi ri dhi ri
T02D3542:181a-34: bu dhi wardha ni sv'a h'a /
T02D3542:181a-35: bya rog gi sgra mi grags par sangs 'dis lan
T02D3542:181a-36: bdun rang sgyur la mngon par bsangs nas ji srid
T02D3542:181a-37: zla ba drug gi bar du 'thungs na shes rab
T02D3542:181a-41: 'di la mi bskyod pa'i rgyas gdab po zhes so //
